One of the best rationales for using JUnit comes from Jeff Canna who wrote an article for IBM's developerWorks:

Testing, fun? Really Using unit and functional tests in the development process
http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/library/j-test.html



Jalam Singh Bhati wrote:

>  Hi,
>     We are developing a J2EE application.How do I
>  justify use of JUnit in my application.In other
>  words how does use of JUnit benefit developers.I am
> really new to JUnit.What are the advantages of using
> JUnit in terms of productivity and time of development
> point of view.
>    It will be really my pleasure to see your reply.
>
>
>  thanks and regards,
>  jalam
